title: Shares of several financial services companies are trading lower as markets sell off following recent strength and as investors await today's Federal Reserve decision. UPDATE: Equities spiked following the Fed's decision to leave rates unchanged, with several stocks now up for the session.

Shares of several financial services companies are trading lower as equities sell off following recent rally. Stocks have rallied over the past week amid optimism towards the US economy reopening and investors have potentially taken some profits following run up.
